clipped.description: Specifies whether or not the parts of a linked resource that flow out of the viewport are clipped.

continuous.description: Indicates if consecutive linked resources from the `reading order` should be handled in a continuous or discontinuous way.

fit.description: Specifies constraints for the presentation of a linked resource within the viewport.

orientation.description: Suggested orientation for the device when displaying the linked resource.

overflow.description: Indicates if the overflow of linked resources from the `readingOrder` or `resources` should be handled using dynamic pagination or scrolling.

spread.description: Indicates the condition to be met for the linked resource to be rendered within a synthetic spread.
